subtitle: We are committed with the training of people for the Merchant Navy
infoDescrip: We are a center created for researching, training and development that adhere in all its parts to the Convention on Training, Certification and Watchkeeping Standards for Seafarers, known as STCW 1978/2010, which is adapted to the changing demands and needs of the Merchant Marine Sector and its related activities, both for the service on board and on land; which in turn is projected and prepared to be part of an interested community, by providing support as a comprehensive training and consultation center in the field of more specialized technical advice.
